roleset.name: attest to the truth of, again
roleset.note: RECONFIRM-V NOTES: Added by Julia for EWT.
RECONFIRMATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia for EWT.

example.name: reconfirm-v
example.text: Nancy , can you please reconfirm with Mark the price for the gas at Bondad ?
example.arg: the price for the gas at Bondad

example.name: reconfirmation-n
example.text: Thus, it appears that Selim, in addition to his reconfirmation of the Treaty of Amasya, also promised to turn over Kars and some other territories to Tahmasp.
